description: Authenticated path traversal vulnerabilities exist in the ArubaOS command line interface. Successful exploitation of these vulnerabilities result in the ability to delete arbitrary files in the underlying operating system.

product.name: Aruba Mobility Conductor (formerly Mobility Master); Aruba Mobility Controllers; WLAN Gateways and SD-WAN Gateways managed by Aruba Central
